fullDescription.text: An object A expects an object B to have been used correctly (CrySL blocks REQUIRES and ENSURES). For example a Cipher object requires a SecretKey object to be correctly and securely generated.
The ORDER block of CrySL is violated, i.e., the expected method sequence call to be made is incorrect. For example, a Signature object expects a call to initSign(key) prior to update(data).
An object A expects an object B to have been used correctly (CrySL blocks REQUIRES and ENSURES). For example a Cipher object requires a SecretKey object to be correctly and securely generated.
A constraint of a CrySL rule is violated, e.g., a key is generated with the wrong key size.

The usage of an object may be incomplete: For example a Cipherobject may be initialized but never used for en- or decryption, this may render the code dead. This error heavily depends on the computed call graph (CHA by default)
An object A expects an object B to have been used correctly (CrySL blocks REQUIRES and ENSURES). For example a Cipher object requires a SecretKey object to be correctly and securely generated.

message.text: First parameter (with value "AndroidKeyStore") should be any of {JCEKS, JKS, DKS, PKCS11, PKCS12}.
message.richText: ConstraintError violating CrySL rule for java.security.KeyStore.

message.text: Unexpected call to method getEntry on object of type java.security.KeyStore. Expect a call to one of the following methods getKey.
message.richText: TypestateError violating CrySL rule for java.security.KeyStore.

message.text: Second parameter was not properly generated as generated Key.
message.richText: RequiredPredicateError violating CrySL rule for javax.crypto.Cipher.

message.text: Operation on object of type javax.crypto.CipherInputStream object not completed. Expected call to close.

message.text: First parameter was not properly generated as prepared R S A.
message.richText: RequiredPredicateError violating CrySL rule for java.security.KeyPairGenerator.

message.text: Second parameter was not properly generated as generated Cipher.
message.richText: RequiredPredicateError violating CrySL rule for javax.crypto.CipherOutputStream.

message.text: Second parameter was not properly generated as generated Key.
message.richText: RequiredPredicateError violating CrySL rule for javax.crypto.Cipher.

message.text: Operation on object of type java.security.KeyStore object not completed. Expected call to getKey.

message.text: Operation on object of type java.security.KeyStore object not completed. Expected call to java.security.KeyStore: java.security.Key getKey(java.lang.String,char[]).
